text: Hey, does anyone have any idea how to measure interactions between regression variables? I can't seem to find the functionality in e.g. GLM.jl, and I'm willing to write some code to calculate it, but I can't find any formula or anything

elements.text: Hey, does anyone have any idea how to measure interactions between regression variables? I can't seem to find the functionality in e.g. GLM.jl, and I'm willing to write some code to calculate it, but I can't find any formula or anything

text: Would I just do something like `lm(@formula(Y ~ X1 + X2 + X1*X2), df)` ?
